text: niccayamaka allah vanankalil ullavarraiyum, pumiyil ullavarraiyum, unkalukku vacappatutti irukkiran enpataiyum; innum tan arut kotaikalai unkal mitu purattilum, akattilum nirampac ceytirukkiran enpataiyum ninkal ariyavillaiya? Ayinum, makkalil cilar irukkirarkal; avarkal potiya kalviyarivillamalum; nervali illamalum, olimikka vetamillamalum allahvaik kurittut tarkkam ceykinranar
